Class JDBC

java.lang.Object
com.example.software2.JDBC
public class JDBC extends Object
The class object to handle the raw connection to the SQL database

      Returns:

    • closeConnection

      public static void closeConnection()
      Close the connection to the database. Called at the end of each database request to save resources

    • makePreparedStatement

      public static void makePreparedStatement(String sqlStatement, Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Create a prepared statement from a SQL string and connection object
      Parameters:
      sqlStatement - the sql statement to be run
      conn - the connection object to call it on
      Throws:
      SQLException - throws an error if the sqlStatement is invalid

    • validateUser

      public Integer validateUser(String userName, String password)
      Validate the user credentials, and get the user's id
      Parameters:
      userName - the entered username
      password - the entered user password
      Returns:
      Either -1, for no user found with that combination, or the user's ID

    • appointmentConflictDuring

      public boolean appointmentConflictDuring(ZonedDateTime startTime, ZonedDateTime endTime, Integer customerID)
      Check for conflicting appointments when scheduling appointments for a customer
      Parameters:
      startTime - the possible appointment's start time
      endTime - the possible appointment's end time
      customerID - the appointment customer's ID
      Returns:
